column5: Here's a great pic from Wayne Clark flying over the entrance to Sunlight Lake.Creek is looking pretty low so the Altimeter creek from Lac Suel to Broad be low to.
Any boats in sunlight in the spring??

Very busy area.Both Broad and Sunlight are hot spots for fishing.There is a remote cabin in Sunlight that one the camps own and house boats get parked on the Lac Suel side.To busy for you Eck.Fall better.
Ya,don't need to fish in a traffic jam.
